pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Caddo Benchmark ToolThis repository contains files for Caddo Benchmark.## ðŸ”Œ How to run?#### Install via pip```user@computer:~$ pip install caddo-tool```#### Implement all benchmark functions and run from command line```user@computer:~$ caddo_tool```## ðŸ““ Any documentation?Yes, check wiki...
